subsection.name: Check out demo application
subsection.p: You can check out, build and run the demo application like the following:

div.source: $ svn co https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/hst-springsec/hst-springsec-demo/trunk hst-springsec-demo $ cd hst-springsec-demo $ mvn clean package $ mvn -P cargo.run

ul.li: By default, you cannot navigate any page except of login form page without authentication. Please refer to the configuration in /WEB-INF/applicationContext-security.xml for the access configuration.

If you sign in by admin/admin, then you will be able to navigate all the pages. However, if you sign in by editor/editor, then you will be able to navigate all the pages except of '/site/about' page because the /about sitemap item is configured with 'hst:authenticated' = true and 'hst:roles' = [ 'ROLE_admin' ] in the demo. When you visit '/site/about' after signing in by editor/editor, you will get an HTTP 403 error.
